description:
Misaki worries about what Hikaru`s weak point is. Kotaro invites Misaki to watch him perform karate to try and help her out.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Misaki E Kotaro! Um Encontro Excitante!
Misaki and Kotaru - The Two`s Exciting Date
Misaki to Kotarou - Futari no Waku-waku Date
Misaki und Kotaro, ein aufregendes Date
みさきと虎太郎 ♡ 二人のわくわくデート
